tool_description: Compares prices for bathroom fixtures across multiple suppliers and identifies the best deals including shipping and taxes.

product_ids.description: List of product IDs to compare prices for

zip_code.description: ZIP code for shipping and tax calculations

include_tax.description: Include estimated tax in total cost

error_messages: Invalid ZIP code: Provide a valid 5-digit US ZIP code for accurate shipping and tax calculations
Product pricing unavailable: Some products may not have current pricing information available
Too many products: Maximum 15 products can be compared simultaneously
usage: Provide product_ids and zip_code for location-based pricing. Enable include_shipping and include_tax for total cost comparison.

lowest_prices.description: Array of lowest available prices for each product

best_suppliers.description: Array of supplier names offering the best price for each product

total_costs.description: Array of total costs including shipping and tax for each product

savings_potential.description: Array of potential savings compared to highest price for each product
